natSpec.notice: Set reward data to values from old ftso manager
natSpec.dec: Can be called only before activation

natSpec.notice: Activates FTSO manager (daemonize() runs jobs)

Runs task triggered by Daemon.
The tasks include the following by priority
- finalizePriceEpoch     
- Set governance parameters and initialize epochs
- finalizeRewardEpoch
Called if out of gas or any other unknown error occures in flare daemonize call

Adds FTSO to the list of rewarded FTSOs
All ftsos in multi asset ftso must be managed by this ftso manager

Adds FTSO list to the list of rewarded FTSOs
All ftsos in multi asset ftso must be managed by this ftso manager
Removes FTSO from the list of the rewarded FTSOs - revert if ftso is used in multi asset ftso

Replaces one ftso with another
All ftsos in multi asset ftso must be managed by this ftso manager

Bulk replaces one ftso with another
All ftsos in multi asset ftso must be managed by this ftso manager
Deactivates ftsos that are no longer used on ftso registry
Set asset for FTSO
Set asset FTSOs for FTSO - all ftsos should already be managed by this ftso manager
Set fallback mode
Set fallback mode for ftso
Sets governance parameters for FTSOs

natSpec.dec: half-closed intervals - end time not included

natSpec.notice: Gets vote power block of the specified reward epoch

return: epoch id that will expire next
natSpec.notice: Return reward epoch that will expire, when new reward epoch is initialized
Gets governance parameters for FTSOs
Returns current reward epoch index (one currently running)
Implement this function for updating daemonized contracts through AddressUpdater.
Returns reward epoch data
Initializes first reward epoch. Also sets vote power block to FTSOs
Finalizes reward epoch
Closes expired reward epochs
Performs any cleanup needed immediately after a reward epoch is finalized
Finalizes price epoch

Initializes epoch states in FTSOs for reveal. 
Prior to initialization it sets governance parameters, if 
governance has changed them. It also sets price submitter trusted addresses.
Implementation of the AddressUpdatable abstract method.
Returns current reward epoch id without additional checks
Returns price epoch reveal end time.
natSpec.dec: half-closed interval - end time not included

natSpec.notice: Returns price epoch end time.

param._forPriceEpochId: The price epoch id of the end time to fetch.

natSpec.dec: half-closed interval - end time not included

natSpec.notice:
Returns current price epoch id. The calculation in this function
should fully match to definition of current epoch id in FTSO contracts.
